seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Gruve.ai Disrupts AI Consulting With Software-Like Margins  

Companies are struggling to move AI pilot projects into production, despite recognizing the technology's potential. AI consulting startup Gruve.ai, founded by the team behind Rahi Systems, aims to bridge this gap by helping enterprises deploy AI solutions effectively.  

The startup promises software-like margins, challenging traditional consulting models. By focusing on real-world application, Gruve.ai seeks to accelerate AI adoption across industries.
